37.eng-name: Trials and Fierce Battles (Kitab Al-Fitan Wa Al-Malahim)

hadiths.text: Narrated Abu Sa’id Al Khudri :The Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) as saying: A Muslim's best property will soon be sheep which he will take to the tops of the mountains and the places where the rain falls, fleeing with his religion from the civil strife (fitan)

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا يُرَخَّصُ فِيهِ مِنَ الْبَدَاوَةِ فِي الْفِتْنَةِ
chapter.eng-name: The Concession Allowing Living As A Bedouin During The Tribulation
